name: Let's Play: Ballerina
description:
Lets Play Ballerina is a short and sweet story about Julia, a 12 year old girl just starting Ballerina school. She wants to become a famous Ballerina dancer. Along the way she meets Nathan, a boy she falls in love with, but Julia's rival Sofia tries to get both Nathan and the title away from her. Players have to help Julia work hard and get that promotion and possibly Nathan as well.

Learn different ballerina techniques in mini games. Learn steps by following the rhythm. Dance to earn points and get a promotion Buy Ballerina outfits and customize your look. Open up your own shop.
